dao.name: QRY_REMARK_TYP_RF_IS_EXIST_CUST_MN_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) countremark from remark_dt where athena_id =? and remark_typ =? and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_REMARK_DT
dao.statement: SELECT remark_dt.athena_id, remark_dt.cust_cod,REMARK_TYP_RF.TYPE_NAM, REMARK_DT.REMARK, REMARK_TYP_RF.remark_TYP, remark_dt.INS_DAT, remark_dt.INS_USR, remark_dt.UPD_DAT, remark_dt.UPD_USR FROM REMARK_DT join REMARK_TYP_RF on REMARK_DT.ATHENA_ID = REMARK_TYP_RF.ATHENA_ID AND REMARK_DT.REMARK_TYP = REMARK_TYP_RF.REMARK_TYP WHERE REMARK_DT.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND REMARK_DT.CUST_COD = :cust_cod ORDER BY REMARK_DT.REMARK_TYP
